question: Is there an AI that writes essays?
answer: Yes, EssayMate is one of the best AI essay writers to help users generate argumentative,expository, narrative, descriptive, and plagiarism-free essays. EssayMate gets input fromusers such as topic, word count, type of essay, academic level to create well-written andclear essays with free grammatical errors, logical topic explanation.
